name: INSearchForPhotosIntentResponseCode
desc: Constants indicating the status of the response.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: Your app doesn’t provide a specific status.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: You’re ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case continueInApp
items.desc: Your extension is ready to transfer control to the app in order to display the search results.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: You were unable to perform the search.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must launch your app to search their photos.

items.name: case failureAppConfigurationRequired
items.desc: The user must perform additional configuration steps before searching for photos is possible.
